page.title: 13Amenities
page.content: Other centres catering for adults, are the Whitburn and Marsden Social Club in Front Street, and "The Grey Horse" and "The Jolly Sailor" public houses, in the village centre. The Social Club is open seven days a week and offers dancing, darts, bingo, dominoes, snooker, as well as live entertainment. Membership is restricted to over 18's The village has a number of standard amenities and anything not offered, can be found in nearby Sunderland or South Shields. In Whitburn, there are two police sub-stations, although no fire station or hospital. There is a bank and G.P.O. in the main shopping area. There are 4 telephone boxes and 8 post boxes.
